mapper.select: SELECT id, name, color, COALESCE(article_count, 0) as articleCount, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime FROM t_tag ORDER BY article_count DESC, create_time DESC

SELECT id, name, color, COALESCE(article_count, 0) as articleCount, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime FROM t_tag WHERE article_count > 0 ORDER BY article_count DESC, create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT t.id, t.name, t.color, COALESCE(t.article_count, 0) as articleCount, t.create_time as createTime, t.update_time as updateTime FROM t_tag t INNER JOIN t_article_tag at ON t.id = at.tag_id WHERE at.article_id = #{articleId} ORDER BY t.name

SELECT id, name, color, COALESCE(article_count, 0) as articleCount, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime FROM t_tag WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') ORDER BY article_count DESC, name LIMIT #{limit}
